attributes.action: scrap tv lic in view of DMI wastage of £100m
attributes.additional_details: In view of the news today where it has emerged that £100m of  licence money was wasted following the scrapping of the DMI project, how can the government possibly justify having a compulsory fee?  I have no confidence whatsoever in their ability to manage the budget effectively.  This is in addition to the fact that the quality of programmes over recent years has declined significantly.  I want to have the choice of what I watch and equally have the choice about what I pay for.   SCRAP THE COMPULSORY FEE AND DON'T TELL ME WHAT TO PAY FOR REGARDLESS OF WHAT I CHOOSE TO WATCH.
